name: Blast Lander
description:
This is a small, re-playable, arcade score-chaser game where the only goals are to constantly beat your previous score and unlock more lander ships.Pilot your lander in space and shoot obstacles and enemies while surviving the dangerous asteroid belt filled with alien attacks.Survive as long as you can while dodging between obstacles. Pick up the wide variety of awesome power ups and pick ups to help you survive longer. Get the highest score you can and collect coins to buy more landers.

  • Hyper addictive “one more try” style game.
  • Easy to learn, simple arcade style controls.
  • Dodge and shoot! fight back with your awesome blaster engine.
  • A variety of power ups and pick ups to help your survival.
  • Get scores and collect coins to unlock new landers.
  • Steam achievements, leaderboard, and trading cards!
